metadata.description: Generate parametric 3D enclosure designs in OpenSCAD for Arduino/ESP32/RP2040 projects. Use when user needs a project box, wants to design a case, or asks for help creating an enclosure. Generates customizable designs with mounting holes, ventilation, and cable management.
metadata.author: arduino-skills contributors

plugins.name: enclosure-designer
plugins.description: Generate parametric 3D enclosures in OpenSCAD with mounting holes and customization options
